channel.title: I wanted to add some new commands, can anyone help?
channel.description: I wanted to add some new commands, can anyone help?Ok, I wanted to add a ::KBD commands to my server my server if from RicScape v2 but alittle edited. I typed in ::Kbdcave commands or ::kqueen commands none of them work. so I wanted to know if anyone would help me, and when I add an npc to autospawn.cfg and Npchandler none of them work. When I compile my server if won't let me go on.

item.title: I wanted to add some new commands, can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I finally found it in client.java it says the x coords:2727 y coords:9775
when I click shop on player emotes and click shop it take me to varrock east bank.
I go alittle north-east and it shows to elves near a door and they say "DARE TO ENTER THE BLACK DRAGON CAVE?"or something like that I click on the door and nothing happens same thign when I try on a regular account

Read full topic
item.source: I wanted to add some new commands, can anyone help?

item.title: I wanted to add some new commands, can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

Search a Teleport Command in client.java and then copy that code and under it when the whole code is finished paste it there and edit the coords that it leads to and the name such as -

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kbd") && playerRights >= 0) { teleportToX = XCoord; teleportToY = YCoord; }

Optional:If you want to add a message to that teleport command do this -

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kbd") && playerRights >= 0) { teleportToX = XCoord; teleportToY = YCoord; sendMessage("Message"); }

Read full topic
